subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Orioles had elected not to hold Mark Teixeira, slowed by a nagging calf injury, on base. In Game 5, he took advantage with a stolen base that led to the first run of the game.
snippet: The Orioles had elected not to hold Mark Teixeira, slowed by a nagging calf injury, on base. In Game 5, he took advantage with a stolen base that led to the first run of the game.
